page.title: 04HOME LIFE.A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY
page.content: {She gets up at any time between seven {o'clock and seven thirty am, has a {glass of orange juice and boiled egg {gets herself and her bag ready and {rushes to school (nine o'clock am). { Once there she'll tumble into {assembly (out of breath)! She now has {a lesson of French followed by {Maths.When lunch time arrives, she {finds that her Mum has only given her {a sandwhich and a chocolate biscuit. {She's so hungry that she makes every {effort to eat slowly (that way it {seems to be more). { The next lesson is Needlework, {she is attempting to make a rabbit but {it has turned into a mouse. she then {has choir, where they have started a {new song.After school she goes off to {Recorder club where they play pieces {with at least four parts to them. At {about quarter to four she goes home.
